entry.def: A sleepless night is one during which you do not sleep.

example.ex: I have sleepless nights worrying about her.
example.tran: 我好几个晚上都睡不着，一直担心她。

entry.def: Someone who is sleepless is unable to sleep.

example.ex: A sleepless baby can seem to bring little reward.
example.tran: 宝宝睡不着觉似乎没有任何好处。

means.word_mean: 1. a temporary state in which you are unable (or unwilling) to sleep
